cause.description:
We plan to commandeer a ship and go of in search of Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, and Keira Knightley because a pirate ship would not be the same without them.
1. Piracy should be encouraged
2. Rum is the best
3. Johnny Depp and Orlando Bloom are HOT
4. Keira Knightly is the shit...
cause.mission: To pillage, pulunder, commodeer, and drink lots of rum
cause.name: Promote Piracy
